name: Expect the Uneggpected
description:
Diana Studstill - 3D Modeler

Eduardo Pineiro-Barros - Sound Design

Erica/Aquarica - VR Control Setup

Rayyan Haque - Programmer/Game Design/Level Designer

Risky32 - 2D Artist

No movement controls other than moving head around to see.

Unfortunately due to time constraint and lack of proper VR testing, the game is a shell of what it could've been.
